GetKeyFrames.short_help: Return a table of all keyframe times for this input

WindowControlsVisible.short_help: Returns the visible state of the window controls for this input

HideWindowControls.short_help: Hides or shows the window controls for this input
HideWindowControls.description:
Args: Hide - 'true' (default) will hide the controls, 'false' will show them.
      Hides/Shows can be nested.

ViewControlsVisible.short_help: Returns the visible state of the view controls for this input

HideViewControls.short_help: Hides or shows the view controls for this input
HideViewControls.description:
Args: Hide - 'true' (default) will hide the controls, 'false' will show them.
      Hides/Shows can be nested.

GetConnectedOutput.short_help: Returns the output that this input is connected to

ConnectTo.short_help: Connect the Input to an Output
